# 🚀 Welcome to the CuPy Blog
![CuPy Logo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/harshitasingh241106/Blog_CuPy/master/Screenshot%202025-02-24%20192808.png)

This blog explores **CuPy**, a powerful GPU-accelerated alternative to **NumPy** for high-performance computing. Learn how to speed up numerical computations using **CUDA**!

---
## 📌 Featured Posts

### 🔹 [Introduction to CuPy](cupy-blog.md)
CuPy is an open-source library that accelerates numerical computations using **CUDA**. It provides a seamless transition from **NumPy** to GPU-based operations.

### 🔹 [Installing CuPy on Your System](installation.md)
A step-by-step guide to installing CuPy, setting up CUDA, and troubleshooting common issues.

### 🔹 [CuPy vs NumPy - Performance Benchmark](performance.md)
A comparison of CuPy and NumPy execution speeds with code examples.

### 🔹 [Using CuPy with Custom CUDA Kernels](cuda-kernels.md)
Learn how to write **custom CUDA kernels** for **ultra-fast** numerical computations.
